## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G27580](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G27580)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>SAP3</u>
- **Gene Name:** Stress Associated Protein3
- **Description:**   A20/AN1-like zinc finger family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2042011
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
